criteria: 80% unit test coverage; All integration tests for registration passing; Linter and security scans (SAST/SCA) are clean.
success_metrics: Zero critical bugs; CI pipeline passes consistently.

criteria: All E2E tests for the login-logout flow passing; Manual security review of the JWT blocklist implementation is complete and signed off.
